tournament.pageSubtitle: Configure your tournament and start playing!

Americano: Players play in pairs with randomly selected partners
Players play against randomly selected opponents in each match
Points are earned individually by each player
The winner is the player with the highest number of points
Mexicano: In the first round, players play with randomly selected partners and opponents
In each subsequent round, the system divides players into groups of 4 based on points and randomly pairs them within the group
Points are earned individually by each player
The winner is the player with the highest number of points
